about_the_game:
Introduction

2048 - Dungeons is a Roguelite puzzle game. Venture into the perilous dungeon of Blockshire as you uncover the mysteries surrounding the place. Help the town and earn powerful rewards for your next journey.

Choose Your Hero

At the start of your adventure, you must choose from four heroes (or more), each with unique abilities that can help you conquer this dungeon!

Attack!

It’s time to use your 2048 knowledge. To win, merge blocks to match your Enemy's HP level. Use strategy, powers, and even the board itself to defeat everyone in your path.

Beware of Traps

But be careful, your enemies won’t just stand by. Monsters can set traps on the blocks, hindering your vision, movement, dealing damage, and more!

Improve the Town

Help the town of Blockshire prosper and upgrade its establishments. Each upgrade can help you in some way.

Other Game Modes

Besides the Story Mode, you can test your skills in something quicker and more straightforward in Arcade Mode. Or, if you have the endurance, face the ultimate challenge in Endless Mode.

Features:

  • Three game modes: Story Mode, Arcade Mode, and Endless Mode.

  • Procedural Dungeon: No attempt is the same as the previous one.

  • Progressive difficulty: New floor, new dangers.

  • Rebuild Blockshire: Recruit heroes, upgrade establishments, and build your town.

  • Variety of enemies: Over 60 different enemies scattered across the 3 dungeons.

  • Seed: Use seeds in Arcade Mode to replay the same dungeon, or share it with friends.

  • Variety of traps: Various traps to hinder your progress. From a dark cloud that blocks vision to chains that prevent block movement.

  • And more...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti (3072 VRAM); Radeon HD 6850 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200); AMD FX-4350 (4 * 4200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 2048 VRAM; Radeon RX 460 4096 VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A game that mixes 2048 puzzle mechanics with a roguelite style of play, creating deadly battles where staying calm and thinking strategically are essential for victory. Make improvements, train your character, recruit allies and try your luck in the terrible dungeon of Blockshire.
